38 
39 #pragma once
40 
41 #include <boost/make_shared.hpp>
42 #include <boost/pool/pool_alloc.hpp>
43 
44 namespace moveit
45 {
46 namespace util
47 {
48 // Useful template for creating messages from a message pool
49 template <typename T>
50 boost::shared_ptr<T> make_shared_from_pool()
51 {
52  using allocator_t = boost::fast_pool_allocator<boost::shared_ptr<T>>;
53  return boost::allocate_shared<T, allocator_t>(allocator_t());
54 }
55 
56 } // namespace util
57 } // namespace moveit
